Package suncertify.db

Interface Summary
DBAccess Data access interface of the proprietary database file of the URLyBird room reservation system.
 

Class Summary
AsyncFileWriter An asynchronous process for writing to the database file.
AsyncFileWriterTask A database file write operation to be queued to an AsyncFileWriter for later execution in a separate thread.
CreateRecordTask A database operation to create a new record.
Data Proprietary database of the URLyBird room reservation system.
DeleteRecordTask A database delete record operation.
EndFileWritingTask Marker class to indicate to the AsyncFileWriter to stop executing database file operations.
Lock An abstraction of a lock on a database record.
Record A record from the database.
ShutdownDatabase This thread properly handles shutting down the database when the JVM exits.
UpdateRecordTask A database operation to update a record in the database file.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateKeyException Thrown when an attempt is made to insert a record that already exists in the database.
LockExpiredException Thrown when an attempt is made to modify a record with a lock that has expired.
RecordNotFoundException Thrown when a database record no longer exists, or is marked as deleted.
SecurityException Thrown when an attempt is made to modify a database record that is locked by another.
